dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4741 IH: To require the Postmaster General to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Zeldin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To require the Postmaster General to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities, and for other purposes.

section.text: Not later than 60 days after the date of enactment of this section, the Postmaster General of the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP code for, as nearly as practicable, the communities of Flanders, Northampton, and Riverside in the Town of Southampton, New York.
